div.p: This implementation guide describes Clinical Decsion Support (CDS) for the American College of Emergency Physicians (ACEP) Emergency Department COVID-19 Severity Classification guideline. This logic represents an initial Minimum Viable Product (MVP) that implements a subset of the logic defined by ACEP. Refer to the ACEP Guideline.

This MVP implementation is intended to align with, and eventually be replaced by, an equivalent logic library with substantially expanded functionality that is generated from OMG Business Process Modeling (BPM+) decision and case models, using an automated toolchain. Refer to the Open Clinical Practice Guidelines GitHub project.
